name: Cyber Blitz
description:
Cyber Blitz was the capstone game created in the Fall 2017 semester at Northwest Vista College. This was created and submitted to the E3 College Game Competition of 2018! It had an extensive team of 17 students. 

This is a multiplayer game! Plug in a controller to your PC and play with up to 4 players. You can also play with Keyboard and mouse.

More details to come.
